description: Ultrasoft cotton interlock makes this jacket the perfect lightweight layer. Team yours with the coordinating pants for a fresh take on the track suit.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 30½" body length (front and back), a 24" shoulder, a 29" chest, and a 37" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 33½" body length (front and back), a 24" shoulder, a 29" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Ribbed mockneck with contrast tipping. Full-zip front.
Long sleeves. Ribbed cuffs with contrast tipping. Contrasting stripe along each sleeve.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
